data = data[-(5*12):]
Listing 12.11: Example of reducing the size of the dataset.
The period of the seasonal component is about one year, or 12 observations. We will use this
as the seasonal period in the call to the exp smoothing configs() function when preparing
the model conﬁgurations.
# model configs
cfg_list = exp_smoothing_configs(seasonal=[0, 12])
Listing 12.12: Example of specifying some seasonal conﬁgurations.
